title: Spin
description: Mafia capo, Antonio Spinelli blew through my orderly life like a cyclone.Gorgeous and passionate, with a breathtaking brutality, he put me under his spell the moment he touched me, drawing me into his underworld of risk, violence and betrayal.And I found, just as this sophisticated savage didn’t trust me, I didn’t trust myself. Something happened to me. Some alchemy from the heat between us.I discovered I was a savage, too.
author: C.D. Reiss
